main.name: LUQUE Mateo
main.intro: Hello, I am Mateo (Sqwado on The Web), a computer science student passionate about software development and modern technologies. I have worked on various projects, including stock management and information system development. I am passionate about continuous learning, improving my skills, and solving problems.

xps.title: 2022 - NSI, Mathematics Baccalaureate (Honors)
xps.description: I obtained my baccalaureate in 2022 with honors, specializing in NSI (Digital and Computer Science) and Mathematics with an average of 14.6.

xps.title: 2022 - Start of Bachelor in Computer Science
xps.description: Started my university studies in computer science at Sophia Ynov Campus, where I began learning the basics of programming and software development.

xps.title: 2024 - Stock Management System Internship
xps.description: I completed a 2.5-month internship at FlyingEye, a company specializing in drones, where I developed a stock management system for the parts needed for their activities.

xps.title: 2024 - Start of Apprenticeship
xps.description: Started my apprenticeship contract at FlyingEye as a multitasking developer, where I work on developing their information system and managing their stock.

xps.title: 2027 - Obtaining Master's Degree in Computer Science (upcoming)
xps.description: I plan to obtain my Master's degree in Computer Science in 2027, specializing in software development and information systems.

skills.title: My Skills
skills.skill1: Front-end development with React and Vite.js, and back-end with Node.js and Express
skills.skill2: Project management with agile methods and collaboration tools
skills.skill3: Continuous integration and deployment with modern tools

blog_overview.title: About the Blog
blog_overview.description: This blog is a space where I share my professional experiences, technical challenges, and learnings throughout my projects, particularly in software development and modern technologies.

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.description: Feel free to contact me for any questions or collaboration proposals. I would be happy to discuss with you.

info.title: Contact Information
info.details: All contact information is available below and in the downloadable CV.

footer.text: Thank you for visiting my website. Feel free to contact me for any questions or collaboration proposals.
